text:
Surprisingly well flavored BCM, tender pork and liver and tasty soup.

Tho always snaking long queue during lunch, turnover for tables are pretty fast.

One of my fav minced meat noodle shop in the west. Meat is tender, liver cook to perfection. Soup taste flavourful and no thirsty feeling afterwards. Hopefully means no or little msg. Noodle portion is abit small so I always order extra noodle.

i came here after looking at google reviews and the affordable pricing. The price is as advertised and very reasonable.  Noodle, soup and meat are all of very good taste and texture, not too hard or dry or tasteless.. I can tell every part of the dish is well thought of and I really enjoy it

Fresh pork slice, minced meat and liver to pair with rice or noodles.
Most importantly pork liver are always just cooked and silky.
Pork soup is unbeatable.

Current fav comfort food for lunch.
Place a bit cramp. But clean and fast.
Ingredients fresh. Liver very nice.
